animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. I love peanuts! Who am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I am known for eating this.
🐘 I am very big and grey.
🌍 I live in Africa and Asia.

animal.question: I say 'meow' and love to chase mice. I purr when I'm happy. Who am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I like to drink this.
🧶 I like to play with this.
🐈 I am a common house pet.

animal.question: I have a long neck and spots all over. I eat leaves from tall trees. Who am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I like to eat leaves.
🦒 I am the tallest mammal.
🌍 You can find me in Africa.

animal.question: I waddle when I walk and quack when I talk. I love to swim in the pond. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦆 My babies are called ducklings.
🌾 I like to eat seeds and plants.
💦 I float on the water.

animal.question: I have a big mane and I roar very loud. I am known as the king of the jungle. Who am I?

hints.text: 👑 I am a ruler in my habitat.
🥩 I eat meat.
🦁 I am a large cat.

animal.question: I hop around and eat carrots. I have long ears and a fluffy tail. Who am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I love to eat this orange vegetable.
🐰 I am often associated with Easter.
🌱 I eat plants.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes. I look like a horse but I'm not. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦓 My pattern helps me blend in.
🌍 I live in Africa.
🐴 I belong to the horse family.

animal.question: I can fly without wings. I build my home out of mud. Some people are afraid of me. Who am I?

hints.text: 🕷️ Some of my relatives have eight legs.
🕸️ I spin webs to catch food.
🐛 I eat insects.

animal.question: I have a pouch where I carry my young. I hop around in the Australian outback. Who am I?

hints.text: 🇦🇺 I am only found in certain parts of the world.
🌱 I am a herbivore.
🦘 I am known for my powerful legs.

animal.question: I live in the ocean and have eight arms. I can change color to hide from predators. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I am an invertebrate.
🌊 I live in the sea.
🌈 I am a master of camouflage.

weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain. I'm white and cold, and good for snowballs. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I'm made of frozen water.
🧤 You need gloves to play with me.
☃️ You can build a snowman with me.

weather.question: I come after rain, and I'm colorful in the sky. You can see me when the sun shines through water droplets. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have many colors.
☀️ I need the sun to appear.
💧 I'm a curve of light.

weather.question: I am water falling from the sky. Farmers love me, and I help plants grow. What am I?

hints.text: ☔ You need an umbrella when I fall.
🌱 Plants need me to live.
💧 I can be a gentle shower or a heavy downpour.

weather.question: I am hot and bright, and I shine during the day. I give the Earth light and warmth. What am I?

hints.text: 😎 You need sunglasses when I'm out.
☀️ I rise in the East and set in the West.
🔥 I'm a giant ball of fire.

weather.question: I am a strong, spinning storm over the ocean. I have an eye in the middle, and I can cause lots of damage. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I am named after people.
🌊 I bring high waves and heavy rain.
💨 I have very strong winds.

weather.question: I am cold and icy, and I fall from the sky like rain, but I'm much harder. I can bounce when I hit the ground. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am a form of precipitation.
🤕 Sometimes I can hurt if I hit you.
🏌️ I am bigger than raindrops.

weather.question: I am a dark cloud that brings lightning and thunder. You often see me in the summer. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I make loud noises.
🌧️ I usually bring heavy rain.
🌳 Trees can be struck by lightning during me.

weather.question: I am a mixture of smoke, dust, and other pollutants in the air, making it difficult to see. I'm common in cities. What am I?

hints.text: 😷 You might need a mask in me.
🌆 I make the sky look hazy.
🏭 I'm often caused by factories and cars.

weather.question: I am a swirling column of air that touches the ground. I'm shaped like a funnel and can be very destructive. What am I?

hints.text: 🌪️ I often form during thunderstorms.
🏠 I can lift cars and destroy buildings.
💨 I am measured on the Fujita scale.

weather.question: I am a long period of very little rain, causing plants and animals to suffer. What am I?

hints.text: 🏜️ The ground becomes very dry during me.
🔥 Wildfires are more common when I happen.
💧 Water becomes scarce.
